(:action clean ; Clean a specified area or item and update its status
  :parameters (?agent - player ?target - object ?location - location)
  :precondition (and
    (at ?target ?location)
    (at ?agent ?location)
    (or (dusty ?location) (full ?target) (dirty ?target)))
  :effect (and
    (or (dust_free ?location) (clean ?target) (not (full ?target))

(:action pickup
  :parameters (?item - object ?container - object ?agent - person)
  :precondition (and (at ?item around_house) (at ?agent around_house))
  :effect (and (inventory ?agent ?item) (not (at ?item around_house))
